description_for_human: Official community PumpFun SDK for creating, buying, and selling tokens on the Solana blockchain. Bonding curve pricing, AMM migration, tiered fees, creator fee sharing, token incentives, and vanity address generation.
description_for_model: Pump SDK (@pump-fun/pump-sdk) â€” TypeScript SDK for the Pump protocol on Solana. Offline-first instruction builders (PumpSdk/PUMP_SDK singleton) and online SDK (OnlinePumpSdk) for token creation, bonding curve trading, AMM migration, fee sharing, social fee PDAs, and token incentives across Pump, PumpAMM, and PumpFees programs. Also includes Rust vanity address generator (100K+ keys/sec), TypeScript vanity generator, MCP server for AI agents (47 tools), Telegram bot with PumpEventMonitor, WebSocket relay server, live trades dashboard, PumpOS web desktop with 169 Pump-Store apps, x402 payment protocol, and production Bash scripts. All crypto uses only official Solana Labs libraries.
